documentation.text:
@title CrossChainPoolPriceCustomFeed
 @notice FDC-verified custom price feed updated from PriceRelay relays on Flare.
 Relay flow (for chains not directly supported by FDC EVMTransaction):
 - A relayer reads the pool state off-chain on the source chain.
 - The relayer calls PriceRelay.relayPrice(...) on Flare, emitting PriceRelayed.
 - FDC attests the Flare transaction (EVMTransaction on Flare).
 - Anyone calls updateFromProof(proof) here to update the feed.
@notice keccak256("PriceRelayed(uint256,address,uint160,int24,uint128,address,address,uint256,uint256,uint256,address)")
@notice PriceRelay contract on Flare whose events we trust for this feed.
@notice Source chain ID where the pool exists (e.g., 42161 for Arbitrum).
@notice Uniswap V3 pool address on the source chain this feed is locked to.
@notice FDC verification contract used for proof validation.

function (struct IEVMTransaction.Event memory[] memory) view returns (uint256,uint64)

@title PriceRelay
 @notice Receives relayed prices from external chains and emits attestable events
 @dev Security-hardened with token binding, monotonicity guards, and deviation checks
 
 This contract enables price feeds from chains not directly supported by FDC's EVMTransaction
 attestation (e.g., Arbitrum, Base, Optimism, Polygon). Authorized relayers fetch prices
 off-chain and relay them here, then FDC attests the relay transaction on Flare.
 
 Security Features:
 - Token binding: Pool tokens are locked on enablePool(), verified on each relay
 - Future timestamp rejection: sourceTimestamp must be <= block.timestamp
 - Monotonicity: sourceBlockNumber must strictly increase
 - Rate limiting: minRelayInterval between relays per pool
 - Deviation check: Rejects price swings > MAX_DEVIATION_BPS (50%)
 - Access control: Only authorized relayers can call relayPrice()
 - Emergency pause: Owner can pause all relay operations
@notice Authorized relayer addresses
@notice Supported source chains
@notice Enabled pools per chain: chainId => poolAddress => enabled
@notice Last relay timestamp per pool
@notice Minimum time between relays (prevents spam)
@notice Maximum age of source data accepted
@notice Maximum price deviation allowed (basis points) - 50%

@notice Allowed source timestamp skew into the future (seconds)
 @dev Different chains can have slight clock drift; allow small skew.
@notice Pool configurations: chainId => poolAddress => config

@notice Emitted when price is relayed - THIS IS WHAT FDC WILL ATTEST
 @dev Contains all data needed for PoolPriceCustomFeed to parse and verify

typeDescriptions.typeString: mapping(uint256 => mapping(address => struct PriceRelay.PoolConfig storage ref))

@notice Calculate price deviation in basis points using the *price* implied by sqrtPriceX96.
 @dev Uses FullMath-style mulDiv to avoid overflow when squaring.

@notice Convert sqrtPriceX96 to price (token1/token0) as an integer (Q0).
 @dev price = (sqrtPriceX96^2) / 2^192.

@notice Computes floor(a*b/denominator) with full precision.
 @dev Adapted from Uniswap V3 Core FullMath.mulDiv.

Relay flow (for chains not directly supported by FDC EVMTransaction): - A relayer reads the pool state off-chain on the source chain. - The relayer calls PriceRelay.relayPrice(...) on Flare, emitting PriceRelayed. - FDC attests the Flare transaction (EVMTransaction on Flare). - Anyone calls updateFromProof(proof) here to update the feed.","version":1}},"settings":{"compilationTarget":{"contracts/CrossChainPoolPriceCustomFeed.sol":"IICustomFeed"},"evmVersion":"paris","libraries":{},"metadata":{"bytecodeHash":"ipfs"},"optimizer":{"enabled":true,"runs":200},"remappings":[]},"sources":{"contracts/CrossChainPoolPriceCustomFeed.sol":{"keccak256":"0xc9eafbb946b03b5fd7a55c1bbfa7f862359c34c0fd457d5086f312f009877e5e","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://de1e16221d49ef96fde78f379f5f65c6f3006b638256890087fce6f13029e860","dweb:/ipfs/QmaAyjxC8KN8sncAWRkGVeia5cAv7VyfmAHeD6GrCzFBc1"]}},"version":1}

with token binding, monotonicity guards, and deviation checks  This contract enables price feeds from chains not directly supported by FDC's EVMTransaction attestation (e.g., Arbitrum, Base, Optimism, Polygon). Authorized relayers fetch prices off-chain and relay them here, then FDC attests the relay transaction on Flare.  Security Features: - Token binding: Pool tokens are locked on enablePool(), verified on each relay - Future timestamp rejection: sourceTimestamp must be <= block.timestamp - Monotonicity: sourceBlockNumber must strictly increase - Rate limiting: minRelayInterval between relays per pool - Deviation check: Rejects price swings > MAX_DEVIATION_BPS (50%) - Access control: Only authorized relayers can call relayPrice() - Emergency pause: Owner can pause all relay operations","events":{"PriceRelayed(uint256,address,uint160,int24,uint128,address,address,uint256,uint256,uint256,address)":{"details":"Contains all data needed for PoolPriceCustomFeed to parse and verify"}},"kind":"dev","methods":{"authorizeRelayer(address)":{"params":{"relayer":"Address to authorize"}},"canRelay(uint256,address)":{"params":{"chainId":"Source chain ID","pool":"Pool address"},"returns":{"_0":"True if relay is possible"}},"constructor":{"details":"Deployer becomes owner and first authorized relayer","params":{"_maxPriceAge":"Maximum age of source data in seconds","_minRelayInterval":"Minimum seconds between relays for same pool"}},"disableChain(uint256)":{"params":{"chainId":"Chain ID to disable"}},"disablePool(uint256,address)":{"params":{"chainId":"Source chain ID","pool":"Pool address"}},"enableChain(uint256)":{"params":{"chainId":"Chain ID to enable"}},"enablePool(uint256,address,address,address)":{"details":"SECURITY: Token addresses are bound here and verified on every relay","params":{"chainId":"Source chain ID","pool":"Pool address on source chain","token0":"Token0 address (will be bound)","token1":"Token1 address (will be bound)"}},"getPoolConfig(uint256,address)":{"params":{"chainId":"Source chain ID","pool":"Pool address"},"returns":{"_0":"Pool configuration struct"}},"relayPrice(uint256,address,uint160,int24,uint128,address,address,uint256,uint256)":{"details":"Only callable by authorized relayers. Includes all security guards.","params":{"liquidity":"Current liquidity from pool","poolAddress":"The Uniswap V3 pool address on source chain","sourceBlockNumber":"Block number from source chain","sourceChainId":"The chain ID where the pool exists","sourceTimestamp":"Block timestamp from source chain","sqrtPriceX96":"Current sqrtPriceX96 from slot0","tick":"Current tick from slot0","token0":"Token0 address (must match registered tokens)","token1":"Token1 address (must match registered tokens)"}},"revokeRelayer(address)":{"params":{"relayer":"Address to revoke"}},"setMaxPriceAge(uint256)":{"params":{"age":"New maximum age in seconds"}},"setMinRelayInterval(uint256)":{"params":{"interval":"New minimum interval in skew."}},"title":"PriceRelay","version":1},"userdoc":{"events":{"PriceRelayed(uint256,address,uint160,int24,uint128,address,address,uint256,uint256,uint256,address)":{"notice":"Emitted when price is
